Improvements.Improvement: Avoid creating empty array for toArray method
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- return measure.getTags().toArray(new String[0]);
+ return measure.getTags().toArray(new String[measure.getTags().size()]);
Improvements.Description: Instead of creating a new empty array for toArray method, create an array with the size of the list that is being converted to an array. This will improve memory usage and performance.

Improvements.Improvement: Use Optional instead of null checks
Improvements.Description: Instead of checking for null values, use Optional. This will make the code cleaner and less prone to NullPointerException.
Instead of just throwing an IllegalStateException, it would be better to handle the exception properly. This will improve the robustness of the program.
